name: Ace of Cups
fortune: A new emotional beginning overflows with potential. Let your heart crack open—something beautiful awaits.

name: Two of Cups
fortune: A bond is forming—mutual, magnetic, and full of promise. Let vulnerability be your strength.

name: Three of Cups
fortune: Joy multiplies when shared. Rejoice with your people—celebration strengthens connection.

name: Four of Cups
fortune: Discontent whispers beneath the surface. What you seek may already be in front of you.

name: Five of Cups
fortune: Not all is lost. Mourn what’s gone, but don’t miss what still stands behind you.

name: Six of Cups
fortune: Nostalgia flows in. Let the past visit you gently, but don't live there.

name: Seven of Cups
fortune: Illusions and options abound. Don’t get lost in dreams—choose with your whole self.

name: Eight of Cups
fortune: You’re ready to leave something behind—not in despair, but in pursuit of what truly calls you.

name: Nine of Cups
fortune: A wish fulfilled brings sweet satisfaction. Let yourself enjoy the moment—without guilt.

name: Ten of Cups
fortune: Emotional harmony surrounds you. This is a moment of true connection—hold it dearly.

name: Page of Cups
fortune: A sweet surprise stirs your heart. Innocence and intuition guide you toward emotional growth.

name: Knight of Cups
fortune: The romantic and idealist ride forward. Follow your heart, but keep your eyes open.

name: Queen of Cups
fortune: Your compassion is deep magic. Listen to what isn’t said—you already understand.

name: King of Cups
fortune: Emotional mastery doesn’t mean coldness. Steady the storm—lead with kindness, not chaos.

name: Ace of Swords
fortune: A piercing truth reveals itself. Seize this moment of mental clarity to cut through the noise.

name: Two of Swords
fortune: A choice waits in stillness. Trust your instincts when logic reaches its limit.

name: Three of Swords
fortune: Heartbreak cuts deep, yet truth emerges from the wound. Let pain clarify your path.

name: Four of Swords
fortune: Rest is sacred. Still your mind and let the silence replenish you.

name: Five of Swords
fortune: You may win the argument but lose the connection. Consider what truly matters.

name: Six of Swords
fortune: The storm is behind you. A quiet passage forward awaits—trust the transition.

name: Seven of Swords
fortune: Cunning can serve or sabotage. Are you slipping away or slipping up?

name: Eight of Swords
fortune: Your thoughts are the true cage. You’re not as stuck as you feel.

name: Nine of Swords
fortune: Anxieties loom larger in the night. What if the shadows are only thoughts unspoken?

name: Ten of Swords
fortune: It’s over. Let what has ended stay buried. From ruin, only rebirth remains.

name: Page of Swords
fortune: Mental energy crackles. You’re learning fast—stay sharp, but don’t let restlessness rule.

name: Knight of Swords
fortune: You charge ahead with fierce clarity. Just be sure your cause is worth the clash.

name: Queen of Swords
fortune: Truth is your compass. Speak with clarity, act with grace, and cut what no longer serves.

name: King of Swords
fortune: Authority earned through intellect. Speak decisively—your words shape the air.

name: Ace of Wands
fortune: Inspiration ignites. This spark wants fire—act before the moment passes.

name: Two of Wands
fortune: Your world is expanding. Stand at the threshold and dare to envision more.

name: Three of Wands
fortune: Your efforts begin to show promise. What you’ve sent out is finding its way back.

name: Four of Wands
fortune: A milestone is reached. Savor this moment of harmony and homecoming.

name: Five of Wands
fortune: Tension crackles in the air. Compete with honor—or step back and redirect your fire.

name: Six of Wands
fortune: Victory is yours—earned, not given. Let others cheer, but remember what it cost.

name: Seven of Wands
fortune: You’ve earned your ground. Now defend it—with fire in your belly and calm in your mind.

name: Eight of Wands
fortune: Momentum surges. Things are aligning fast—stay alert and ride the wave.

name: Nine of Wands
fortune: You’re weary, but you’re not done. One last push—your resilience is your strength.

name: Ten of Wands
fortune: You carry more than you must. Delegate or drop the load—it’s time to lighten your soul.

name: Page of Wands
fortune: The fire of youth burns bright. Adventure beckons—explore with wonder and nerve.

name: Knight of Wands
fortune: You’re all fire and motion—passion leads. Don’t burn the map on your way out.

name: Queen of Wands
fortune: You blaze with charisma and bold warmth. Own your radiance—others already feel it.

name: King of Wands
fortune: Leadership through vision. Set the course boldly—others will follow your flame.

name: Ace of Pentacles
fortune: The seed of prosperity has been planted. Nurture it well—wealth is more than coins.

name: Two of Pentacles
fortune: You’re juggling life’s demands with skill. Stay flexible; rhythm is more powerful than control.

name: Three of Pentacles
fortune: You’re building something of value—collaboration is your foundation.

name: Four of Pentacles
fortune: Holding too tightly can trap the flow. Protect what matters, but don't let fear rule.

name: Five of Pentacles
fortune: Hardship may isolate you, but you are not alone. Help is closer than it seems.

name: Six of Pentacles
fortune: Give freely—but wisely. Balance between generosity and discernment is key.

name: Seven of Pentacles
fortune: Patience is your quiet ally. Growth takes time—nurture, wait, and trust the roots.

name: Eight of Pentacles
fortune: Skill is built in repetition. Dedicate yourself—what you make will one day master you.

name: Nine of Pentacles
fortune: You’ve cultivated success through care and independence. Bask in your self-made garden.

name: Ten of Pentacles
fortune: Legacy and abundance are within reach. Think beyond now—build something that lasts.

name: Page of Pentacles
fortune: Curiosity meets practicality. A new venture begins—ground your dreams in the real.

name: Knight of Pentacles
fortune: Steady and slow wins this race. Progress may be dull, but it’s dependable.

name: Queen of Pentacles
fortune: The hearth is your kingdom. Abundance flows from your care—don’t forget to receive it too.

name: King of Pentacles
fortune: Security and success are yours to command. Build wisely and share your harvest.
